html: call evil good, and good evil. Wicked ways are often confused with moral values by those who believe they know more than God or his prophets—they are deceived or they seek to justify themselves in their disobedience. Sin is accepted in the world, and evil becomes an acceptable way of life. Moro. 7:14 warns: "Wherefore, take heed, my beloved brethren, that ye do not judge that which is evil to be of God, or that which is good and of God to be of the devil."
